description: This file defines a Flutter widget called SwipeDetector, which detects swipe gestures (left, right, up, down) on its child widget. It provides configurable thresholds for distance and velocity to determine a valid swipe, and callbacks for each direction. The implementation handles gestures to distinguish between different swipe directions and triggers the appropriate callbacks.

classes.name: SwipeDetector
classes.description: A Flutter widget that wraps a child widget to detect swipe gestures in four directions (left, right, up, down). It allows configuration of thresholds and callback functions for each swipe direction.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, which manages gesture detection logic.
